title: Handle Post-Shipment Delivery Address Change
description: A customer needs to change the delivery address for an order that has already been shipped.

tasks.description: Locate the order and its tracking number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the necessary order and tracking details.

tasks.description: Access the carrier's portal to see if a 'package intercept' or 'address correction' is possible.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that the carrier offers a package intercept service for a fee.

tasks.description: Inform the customer of the possibility and the associated fee, and if they agree, submit the intercept request to the carrier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the options and successfully submits the request.
